Also, you could make this just load custom ‘dots’ for admins. Like how the friends list loads green dots for friends. I bet someone already suggested this but I cba to look through 3 pages

Look two posts above yours…
[/quote]:([/quote]Young one, please, don’t cry. You’ll make me cry! Olook!

[quote=“sk8rdude461, post:51, topic:179459”][quote author=the elve age link=topic=240634.msg4230771#msg4230771 date=1361253431]

Also, you could make this just load custom ‘dots’ for admins. Like how the friends list loads green dots for friends. I bet someone already suggested this but I cba to look through 3 pages

Look two posts above yours…
[/quote]

Dat timing.
:D[/quote]Elve, he is making fun of us!!!
